title: Cuisinart Elite 12-Cup Die Cast Metal Food Processor at Bed Bath & Beyond

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/cuisinart-reg-elite-12-cup-die-cast-metal-food-processor-with-disk-storage-case/1016962430. 
This food processor comes with nesting 11-cup large work bowl and 4 1/2 cup small bowl, both with pour spouts and maximum liquid fill lines, that allow you to prepare several recipes at once and eliminate the need to clean bowls in between tasks. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.
